description.2: Communicate with people nearby in real time

signUp.title: Sign up
signUp.passwordRule: Please enter a password of at least 8 characters

error.phoneNumberInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number
error.authCodeInvalid: Please enter a valid verification code
error.authCodeTimeout: The verification code has expired. Please request again
error.authCodeNotSent: Unable to send verification code. Please try again
error.serverError: A server error has occurred. Please try again
error.passwordShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
error.passwordLong: Password must be less than 20 characters
error.passwordInvalid: Password must contain letters, numbers, and special characters
error.userIDInvalid: User ID can only contain letters and numbers
error.userIDInvalidAlphabet: User ID must contain at least 4 lowercase letters
error.userIDInvalidAlphabetFirst: User ID must start with a letter
error.userIDShort: User ID must be at least 4 characters
error.userIDLong: User ID must be less than 20 characters
